title: Hu Jintao Was Escorted Out of Chinaâ€™s Congress, Raising Questions
description: A health scare? A brazen political gesture? Whatever else it was, the episode was awkward.
dc:creator: Chang Che
media:description: The unexpected departure of a former leader, Hu Jintao, standing, who apparently paused to speak to Mr. Xi before being escorted out, caused a brief stir during in proceedings that are usually tightly choreographed.
